participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and energetic, always looking for fun and new experiences.
participant_1.background: I have pink hair. I'm the youngest of five. I'm allergic to bees. I live in the city of Grand Rapids, Michigan.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and driven, focused on achieving goals and enjoying life.
participant_2.background: My favorite rapper is Yo Gotti. I am addicted to the hit show Empire. God has always been put first in my life. I take pride in getting straight A's.

content.text: Nice to meet you! What are your interests?
I like to listen to music, watch TV, and play video games.
Cool! I like to do those things too. What are your favorite shows?
I love Empire and Black-ish. What about you?
I love those shows too! I also like Modern Family and The Office.
Those are great shows! What about music? What do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is hip-hop. Who is your favorite rapper?
My favorite rapper is Yo Gotti. I love his music. What about you?
I like Yo Gotti too! He's one of my favorites. I also like J. Cole and Kendrick Lamar.
Those are great rappers! I like them too.
What about video games? What do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorite is Call of Duty. What about you?
I like Call of Duty too! I also like Fortnite and Apex Legends.
Those are great games! I like them too.
It's nice to meet you, participant_1. We have a lot in common.
It's nice to meet you too, participant_2. I think we're going to be friends.
